# DEPRECATED

This release is deprecated in favour of v1.23.1, as the version number of this release's source incorrectly points to version 1.22.0. **Please use v1.23.1 instead**.

##### Original Release Notes

- #265 add support for getting/setting firewall rules - @gregmankes
- #262 remove ResolveReference call - @mdanzinger
- #261 Update CONTRIBUTING.md - @mdanzinger
